name: High Noon Shootout
description:
The player takes control of the Sheriff's revolver in this wild west duel. Using left mouse, shoot the gun through the air until you are close enough to the bandit to shoot him.

When you run out of bullets, you lose. When you stay on the ground for more than 2 seconds, you lose. On normal difficulty, if you shoot yourself, you lose.

  • Easy difficulty: 30 bullets, and you can't shoot yourself.
  • Normal Difficulty: 15 bullets, and you can shoot yourself.

If you'd like to see more weapons/levels, please comment below and I may add them.
